overview: Forgotten on her own 18th birthday, Jolene resents her family's concern for her sister, who is dying of a debilitating terminal disease. When Jolene receives an emergency call from her Mother, she must reckon with her jealousy of her dying sister, who is being prepared for a dangerous but possibly life saving surgery.  Director Ian Tan Writers Derrick ChenIan Tan Stars Julesy FlavelleMaxine WandererAlyson Reim
title: A Cure for Silence
